snippet: The two-year fellowship will offer a journalist early in his or her career the opportunity “to build upon Mr. Carr’s commitment to holding power accountable and telling engaging, deeply reported stories,” the company said.
abstract: New York Times announces that it will sponsor journalism fellowship in honor of late media columnist and reporter David Carr.
lead_paragraph: The two-year fellowship will offer a journalist early in his or her career the opportunity “to build upon Mr. Carr’s commitment to holding power accountable and telling engaging, deeply reported stories,” the company said.

headline.main: The Times Announces a Fellowship Named for David Carr
headline.print_headline: The Times Announces a David Carr Fellowship
